Header.title: Laathi
Header.paragraph: Getting old is like climbing a mountain; you get a little out of breath, but the view is much better! - Ingrid Bergman

paragraph: Welcome to LAATHI™, a company dedicated to providing support and assistance to older adults who are living away from their loved ones. We understand that life can be challenging for seniors who may need help with everyday tasks or may feel isolated due to distance from family and friends.

At LAATHI™, we aim to make life easier for older adults by offering a range of services that can be accessed online. From healthcare to home maintenance, from grocery delivery to tech support, we offer a variety of services that can help seniors feel more independent, connected, and comfortable in their daily lives.

Our team of professionals is committed to delivering high-quality services that are tailored to meet the unique needs of each individual. We believe in treating our clients with respect, empathy, and kindness, and we strive to build lasting relationships based on trust and understanding.
Thank you for choosing LAATHI™, and we look forward to working with you to help make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Services.name: OTP Sharing
Services.text: Securely share one-time passwords (OTPs) with companions for verification and authentication purposes, ensuring seamless access to services and transactions.

Services.name: Location Sharing
Services.text: Share real-time location with companions for safety and convenience, allowing them to monitor your whereabouts and provide assistance if needed.

Services.name: Medicine Reminders
Services.text: Receive timely reminders and notifications for medication schedules, helping you stay on track with your health routine and ensuring you never miss a dose.

Services.name: Chat Feature including Audio and Video Call
Services.text: Connect with friends, family, and caregivers through text-based chat, audio calls, and video calls, enabling virtual interactions and social engagement.

Services.name: Transaction Management
Services.text: Manage financial transactions securely within the app, including bill payments and online purchases, ensuring convenient and hassle-free transactions.

Services.name: Order Placement
Services.text: Easily place orders for groceries, or meals through the app, simplifying daily tasks and enhancing convenience.

Testimonials.text: Laathi™ is the need of the hour with highly mobile youth looking for jobs in bigger cities and their parents staying back home with no support system
